title: Contact
text: If you’re convinced, and want to have a chat with me, hit me up! You can reach me at [me @ madebysid.com](mailto:me@madebysid.com?subject=Howdy!). If you’re in Berlin and want to hang, I’m open!
Check out my presence on the interwebs!
Let’s end with some opinions no one asked for:
opinions: Sublime Text > VS Code (in my heart)
CSS Modules > CSS-in-JS (bring on the pitchforks)
